short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make every background photo beautiful.  For SDRs and Recruiters.  Enjoy your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace every background photo with a new (and better) photo from a curated list of great images.  Spend a lot of time surfing social profiles? This extension will add a bit of color, beauty and depth to every page.  Currently supports Linkedin.  New domains will be added in the future.
